sentence.Network_en: She scrubbed the floors of the new apartment zestfully.
sentence.Network_cn: 她热火朝天地擦着新住宅的地板.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 《GRE核心词汇考法精析》l... ... 偷听： listen secretly 热情奔放的： zestfully 行为出格的，不循规蹈矩的： deviating conventional.

sentences.sentence: "she scrubbed the floors of the new apartment zestfully"

auth_sentence.content: When it comes to life experience, the movie's star is no slouch either, and he couches it in zestfully comic terms.
